item.name: Evelyn County Estate
item.address1: 55 Eltham-Yarra Glen Road, Kangaroo Ground, Vic 3097
item.description: Evelyn County is situated 35 mins from Melbourne at the gateway to the Yarra Valley, owned by Michael and Suzanne Whitten. Michael is a Melbourne-based barrister, while Suzanne handles the daily operations of Evelyn County. Their goal is to become as self-sufficient as possible, producing the best possible organic wines. Evelyn County has already received multiple awards for architecture, food and wine. Exports to France, Japan and Malaysia.
